alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ozark, southwestern Douglas and Taney Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Forsyth to 7 miles southeast of Taneyville to near Diamond City to Willis. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Branson... Lake Taneycomo... Bull Shoals Lake... Hollister... Forsyth... Merriam Woods... Kissee Mills... Rockaway Beach... Bull Creek... Taneyville... Theodosia... Kirbyville... Sundown... Brownbranch... Powersite... Protem... Thornfield... Rueter... Rome... Bradleyville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
